content:
"All right, kids! New rule!" Tollin shouts as he pulls you to the edge of the field. A few curious heads pop out of the tall grass as you approach. "Now you have to find the scrof…while avoiding this agile velox!" He winks at you. "Well, what are you waiting for? Go get them, velox!" You roar, and the children flee, squealing with feigned terror.

Discard all   from Tollin and add 1 mirth token to him. Each Ranger soothes 1 fatigue. Ready FUN AND GAMES.
